title: Setup Development Environment
description: Install Node.js, VSCode, and clone the GitHub repo to set up the project locally.

title: Component Library Research
description: Research UI libraries (e.g., Tailwind, Material UI) and document pros and cons.

title: API Integration - User Module
description: Integrate login and registration APIs and test all endpoints.

title: Write Unit Tests for Auth Service
description: Write and validate unit tests for all functions in the authentication module.

title: Database Schema Design
description: Design the ER diagram and define schema for the internship tracking system.
